name: Shape Monster
description:
Description:

A hyper casual shape collecting game that gets harder as you progress.

Oh no! Shape Monster is in trouble! He has to collect as many shapes as possible while avoiding bombs! He only has three lives, if that reaches zero, he has to restart! Can you try and help him?

Update Log:

Game release! If you find any bugs, please report it to our Twitter, or email us at poblankstudios@gmail.com. Recommended ages: 0+

Notes: 

Originally Made for Android Devices by Pointblank Mobile, Ported Over To PC by Pointblank Games. Published (Both Versions) Pointblank Studios.

Controls:

Mobile Controls: Swipe Left and Right to Move

PC Controls: Left and Right Arrow Keys to Move, Or Left and Right with Mouse While Holding Left Click.

Support: poblankstudios@gmail.com or Twitter
